title: demo 运行不起来怎么回事

comments.body: 需要 先运行  npm install

首先，package.json 同级目录下运行 npm install
如果运行 iOS 工程，先安装cocoapods，然后 podfile 同级目录 运行 pod install

body:
clone 下来之后 直接运行脚本start 就出现了下面的问题
`zaihongdeiMac:incubator-weex zaihongshen$ . start 
/bin ~/Work/weex/incubator-weex
npm ERR! Darwin 15.6.0
npm ERR! argv "/usr/local/Cellar/node/7.7.1/bin/node" "/usr/local/bin/npm" "run" "build:native"
npm ERR! node v7.7.1
npm ERR! npm  v4.1.2
npm ERR! path /bin/package.json
npm ERR! code ENOENT
npm ERR! errno -2
npm ERR! syscall open

npm ERR! enoent ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/bin/package.json'
npm ERR! enoent ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/bin/package.json'
npm ERR! enoent This is most likely not a problem with npm itself
npm ERR! enoent and is related to npm not being able to find a file.
npm ERR! enoent 
npm ERR! Darwin 15.6.0
npm ERR! argv "/usr/local/Cellar/node/7.7.1/bin/node" "/usr/local/bin/npm" "run" "build:native"

npm ERR!   errno: -1,

npm ERR! node v7.7.1
npm ERR! npm  v4.1.2
npm ERR! path /bin/package.json
npm ERR! code ENOENT

npm ERR! enoent ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/bin/package.json'

求大神赐教
